title: WP Engine Introduces AI-Powered Search for WordPress Sites
author: Loraine Lawson
description: A beta tool from WP Engine allows users to perform semantic searches on websites built with WordPress within milliseconds.
cntitle: WP Engine 推出 AI 驱动的 WordPress 网站搜索
cndescription: WP Engine 的一个测试工具允许用户在几毫秒内对使用 WordPress 构建的网站执行语义搜索。
